text: Mohamed Hendouf is a Belgian-Moroccan Kickboxer. ==Biography and career== Hendouf started Kickboxing at 20 years old and became pro only 2 years later in August 2013 winning his debut fight with an impressive knockout. His first big success happened in April 2015 when he won the Partouche Kicboxing tournament beating veteran Christophe Pruvost in the final after a highly contested extra round. ==Titles and accomplishments== Professional * 2015 Partouche Kickboxing Tournament Champion * 2018 TKR Tournament Champion * 2019 World Fighting League -70kg Champion ==Kickboxing record== {| class="toccolours" style="width:100%;
